PLZ HIT IN QUALITY IF U LIKE MY WORK

awesome work buddy but from now on upload every film in 1080p

The movie stumbles some parts - quite often unfortunately (just like on an old PC that doesn't has enough power to render the frames - but I assure you is not the case for my PC); overall is watchable, but not quite what I expected from a BRRip at it's size... 
Thanks anyway!
The picture stutters quite often throughout the movie.
